message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm looking to save as much as I can, but I'm still very interested in the product.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but the value of this product is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $11,500?
